name: iShares U.S. Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF
description: The iShares U.S. Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF (IEZ) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to track the investment results of the S&P Oil & Gas Exploration & Production Select Industry Index. This ETF provides investors with exposure to U.S. companies involved in the exploration and production of oil and gas. It serves as a way for individuals and institutions to invest in the energy sector, particularly in companies that are focused on the upstream segment of the oil and gas industry. The fund holds a diversified portfolio of companies, including major corporations and smaller independent firms, allowing investors to benefit from the potential growth of the energy sector while mitigating risks through diversification. The ETF is designed for investors who believe in the long-term prospects of oil and gas exploration and production and want to gain exposure to the performance of this sector. Additionally, IEZ aims to provide liquidity, transparency, and cost-effectiveness, making it an appealing choice for both retail and institutional investors seeking to participate in the oil and gas market.

products: iShares U.S. Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF

faq.question: What is the iShares U.S. Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF?
faq.answer: The iShares U.S. Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF (IEZ) is an ETF that tracks the S&P Oil & Gas Exploration & Production Select Industry Index.

faq.question: What type of companies does IEZ invest in?
faq.answer: IEZ invests in U.S. companies involved in the exploration and production of oil and gas.

faq.question: Who manages the iShares U.S. Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF?
faq.answer: The ETF is managed by BlackRock.
